clip_title: Did you just refer to yourself as the Stifmeister
transcript:
AJ:
Did you just refer to yourself as the Stifmeister? Coz that's, like, the lamest name ever. 
Steve Stifler:
I'm gonna fucking kill you. | Did you just refer to yourself as the Stifmeister Because that's the lamest name ever PEOPLE JEERING I'm going to fucking kill you
subtitles: {"1":{"TimeStart":1,"TimeEnd":3.837,"Text":"Did you just refer to yourself as the Stifmeister"},"2":{"TimeStart":4.003,"TimeEnd":7.132,"Text":"Because that's the lamest name ever"},"3":{"TimeStart":7.507,"TimeEnd":8.717,"Text":"PEOPLE JEERING"},"4":{"TimeStart":9.718,"TimeEnd":11.845,"Text":"I'm going to fucking kill you"}}
movie_writer: Jon Hurwitz, Hayden Schlossberg, Adam Herz
movie_plot: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.
